mapper.select: select id, activity_type as activityType, createtime, latitude, longitude, speed, author_id as authorId from t_studyactivity where author_id = #{authorId} order by createtime desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_studyactivity( id, activity_type, createtime, latitude, longitude, speed, author_id )values( #{id}, #{activityType}, #{createtime}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{speed}, #{authorId} )
